name: silver-lining-mvp
description: Silver Lining MVP - Digital Silver Investment Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd silver-lining-mvp/backend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd silver-lining-mvp/backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: Silver Lining Team
